refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: letsencrypt invokes any of several utilities involved in controlling the Opportunistic Encryption system, running the specified command with the specified arguments as if it had been invoked directly.
ipsec letsencrypt -h lists the available commands.

refsect1.title: COMMANDS
refsect1.para: To get a list of supported commands, use ipsec letsencrypt --help. A few of the commonly used commands are described below
ipsec letsencrypt --client For initial client setup.
ipsec letsencrypt --server For initial server setup.
ipsec letsencrypt --test For testing the configuration/connections.
ipsec letsencrypt --generate-certificate hostname For generating the certificate.
ipsec letsencrypt --renew hostname For updating the generated certificate (keeping the private key same) use the following command.
ipsec letsencrypt --disable For disabling IPsec service.

refsect1.title: RETURN CODE
refsect1.para: The ipsec letsencrypt command passes the return code of the sub-command back to the caller.
